amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to protecting access to fertility services, and eliminating barriers for families in need of high-quality, affordable fertility services by expanding nationwide coverage for in vitro fertilization.

vote.text: Amendment SA 971 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 51. Record Vote Number: 82.

action.text: Amendment SA 971 proposed by Senator Duckworth.
